text: Dear spreadsheet loving friends, behold the beauty and horror of CGP Grey "running" a spreadsheet by combining Pages with Keyboard Maestro to implement the algorithm for apportioning United States House seats by population.  <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6JN4RI7nkes>

attachments.title: Electoral College & Apportionment Spreadsheet!
